```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(rmapshaper)

chunks <- readOGR(dsn = "data/SG_NHS_HealthBoards_2019", layer = "SG_NHS_HealthBoards_2019")

good_chunks <- st_as_sf(chunks)

hb_borders <- ms_simplify(good_chunks) %>% 
  select(HBCode, HBName, geometry) %>% 
  rename("feature_code" = "HBCode")
```
